ygData.subject: Re: Re: 16th Pet and 20pet
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I thought killing the undead at Lake Rathe would cause some horrible faction change and get you banished from the guild or something? I m a Dark Elf, maybe
ygData.messageBody:
>The level 16th pet and 20pet are found in the Grobb Shadow Knight guild. As
>for hunting grounds I would suggest sticking to Oasis until 20 or at 18 or so
>you could move to Lake Rathe and hunt the undead at night and gnolls in the
>day.

I thought killing the undead at Lake Rathe would cause some horrible faction
change and get you banished from the guild or something? I'm a Dark Elf, maybe
it only applies to DE's? Can someone confirm or debunk this? Thanks.

jspectre @ innoruuk
